channel.title: Tokenomics on LegitDAO: a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) building the necessary tools to develop an artificial general intelligence (AGI)
channel.description: Recent content in Tokenomics on LegitDAO: a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) building the necessary tools to develop an artificial general intelligence (AGI)

item.title: Tokenomics of the LegitDAO ecosystem
item.description:
Founders

In the LegitDAO ecosystem, the founders represents the people that first initiated the idea behind the project and put the necessary resources in order to kick-start the project. It represents people that were able to build the technology, understand the finance and can market and sell the idea of its venture.
